mapper.select: SELECT m.members_grade , (tr.tests_date+10)-(9/24) AS UTCTestsDate, (tr.tests_date+10) AS testsDate FROM (SELECT * FROM tests_apply ORDER BY tests_apply_no DESC, tests_date DESC) tr RIGHT OUTER JOIN members m ON m.members_no = tr.members_no WHERE m.members_no = #{membersNo} AND rownum <= 1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY tests_q_unit ORDER BY tests_q_unit,DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM) AS UNITNUM, tests_q_unit, tests_q_no, tests_no, tests_q_contents, tests_q_ex1, tests_q_ex2, tests_q_ex3, tests_q_ex4, tests_q_answer FROM tests_q WHERE tests_no = #{testsNo}) WHERE UNITNUM <= #{allocate}

SELECT t.tests_title "testsTitle", ta.tests_score "testsScore", ta.tests_results "testsResults", ta.tests_time "testsTime", m.members_grade "membersGrade" FROM tests_apply ta JOIN tests t ON ta.tests_no = t.tests_no JOIN members m ON ta.members_no = m.members_no WHERE tests_apply_no = #{testsApplyNo}

SELECT t.tests_title, t.tests_contents, TO_CHAR(ta.tests_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS "TESTS_DATE", ta.tests_score, ta.tests_results, ta.tests_time FROM tests t JOIN tests_apply ta ON t.tests_no = ta.tests_no WHERE ta.members_no = #{membersNo} ORDER BY ta.tests_apply_no
